mapper.select: select count(*) from User_3jo where user_id = #{user_id}
select user_id, nick_name, phoneno, email, user_name, birthday, addr1, addr2, hint, gender, grade from User_3jo where user_id=#{user_id}
mapper.update: update User_3jo set nick_name=#{nick_name}, phoneno=#{phoneno}, email=#{email}, user_name=#{user_name}, addr1=#{addr1}, addr2=#{addr2} where user_id=#{user_id}
mapper.select: select tradeno ,title ,likeno ,viewno ,writedate ,user_id from TradeBoard_3jo where user_id=#{user_id} and (deal_price is null or deal_price='') order by tradeno desc
select tradeno ,title ,likeno ,viewno ,writedate ,user_id from TradeBoard_3jo where user_id=#{user_id} and deal_price REGEXP '^[0-9]+$' order by tradeno desc
select chatno ,title ,likeno ,viewno ,writedate ,user_id from ChatBoard_3jo where user_id=#{user_id} order by chatno desc
select qnano ,title ,writedate ,user_id from QABoard_3jo where user_id=#{user_id} order by qnano desc

select replyno , reply_content , reply_writedate , r1.user_id , r1.tradeno , r2.sell_price , r2.deal_price , chatno , qnano from Reply_3jo r1 left join TradeBoard_3jo r2 on r1.tradeno = r2.tradeno where r1.user_id=#{user_id} order by replyno desc
